description: Stock markets in the Gulf retreated on Wednesday, tracking crude prices, and as global sentiment was weighed by persistent worries that rising interest rates would trigger a global recession.

description: German Finance Minister Christian Lindner urged the European Central Bank on Wednesday to take swift action to get inflation under control.

content:

description: German inflation expectations are showing a worrisome rise, putting price stability at risk, so timely European Central Bank rate hikes are needed to avoid even bigger policy moves later, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said on Thursday.
title: ECB's Nagel: Rise in inflation expectations 'worrying' - Reuters

description: Bringing down inflation is the U.S. central bank's "number one priority right now," but raising interest rates to do so is unlikely to trigger a recession, San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly said on Friday.
